General.Name: Wuxi Smart Auto-control Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Smart Auto-Control Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of process control valves in China. The company offers single seat sleeve valves, sleeve control valves, butterfly valves, ball valves, anti-corrosion valves, material valves, and control valves. It also provides repair and maintenance services for control valves. The company's products are used in the petrochemical, steel, energy, metallurgy, pillar, environmental protection, and other industries. Wuxi Smart Auto-Control Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.
